item.title: Peter add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "There is nothing worse than aggressive stupidity." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Peter add a quote by steve erickson
item.description: "a dream is only a memory of the future" -- steve erickson

item.title: Peter add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "In discarding the monkey and substituting man, our Father in Heaven did the monkey an undeserved injustice." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Peter add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "We construct a narrative for ourselves, and that's the thread that we follow from one day to the next. People who disintegrate as personalities are the ones who lose that thread." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Peter add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "All of us take pride and pleasure in the fact that we are unique, but I'm afraid that when all is said and done the police are right: it all comes down to fingerprints." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Peter add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Peter add a quote by Christopher Moore
Peter add a quote by Elliot Perlman
item.description: "Hell is the special pain that dwells in that loss which you yourself have caused" -- Elliot Perlman

item.title: Peter add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Peter add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Peter add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Peter add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Peter add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Peter add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Peter add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Peter add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "All men contain several men inside them, and most of us bounce from one self to another without ever knowing who we are." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Peter add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "Dismantling the architecture of my discontent" -- Paul Auster

item.title: Peter add a quote by Don DeLillo
item.description: "American writers ought to stand and live in the margins, and be more dangerous." -- Don DeLillo
